commodities.order
Class ContractPanel.ContractTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      commodities.order.ContractPanel.ContractTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, PriceListener, Serializable, TableModel
Enclosing class:
ContractPanel
private class ContractPanel.ContractTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
implements PriceListener

ContractTableModel is a table model for controlling the look and feel of the order table.

Author:
J.R. Titko

Method Detail

addOrder

public void addOrder(ContractOrder order)
Add an order to the last row of the table. If the last row in the table has an order in it after the orders are consolidated, a new row is added to the table.

Parameters:
order - the contract order to add

addRow

public void addRow()
Add a blank row to the table.

addRow

public void addRow(ContractOrderLine line)
Add an order line to the table.

Parameters:
line - the order line to add

addRow

public void addRow(ContractOrder buyOrder,
                   ContractOrder sellOrder)
Add buy and sell order to the table.

Parameters:
buyOrder - the buy order to add
sellOrder - the sell order to add

removeRow

public void removeRow(ContractOrderLine line)
Remove the given row from the table.

Parameters:
line - the order line to remove

getValueAt

public Object getValueAt(int row,
                         int col)
Gets the value at the given row and column in the table. The value is returned as an object that can be type case into the expected type of that cell.

Specified by:
getValueAt in interface TableModel
Parameters:
row - the row of the item desired
col - the column of the item desired
Returns:
the object of the cell

consolidateOrders

private void consolidateOrders(ContractOrder order,
                               int row)
Consolidate the orders in the table based on the passed in order and the row that it currently resides in. The order will be the order to be consolidated into a row above its current location.

Parameters:
order - the order to consolidate on
row - the row the order is originally on

balanceContractCount

private void balanceContractCount(int row)
Split and consolidate order lines as needed to maintain an equal number of contract orders on both the buy and sell side of an order line.

Parameters:
row - the row of the order line to balance

combineOrders

private void combineOrders()
Combine like orders onto a single line. This requires that all of the information for an order is identical including dates, contracts, prices and statuses.

createSupportContractOrderLine

private ContractOrderLine createSupportContractOrderLine(ContractOrder order)
Create a contract order line that contains the requested order and makes an empty offsetting order to complete the line.

Parameters:
order - the order to include on the line
Returns:
the order line
